body_html:
Got it to work with initializing classifier as classifier=Estimator(model_fn=function_name,model_dir=dir_path). If the original function is not specified, it fails.
But, then, I am running into this issue, as I am using a ConvNet(from mnist example of skflow).

body:
Got it to work with initializing classifier as classifier=Estimator(model_fn=function_name,model_dir=dir_path). If the original function is not specified, it fails.
But, then, I am running into[ this issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2797), as I am using a ConvNet(from mnist example of skflow).
